title: Ticket #2548: user log does not identify slot where job runs
description:
Ken and Dan (among others) would like to see which slot ran a job. The user log only records the sinful string of the startd but not the slot.

The workaround is to use EVENT_LOG_JOB_AD_INFORMATION_ATTRS to record RemoteHost. We think the remote host should be recorded by default in the execute event.
creator: danb
